remarks: Change bound variable between domain and range of function. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
cbvfo.1 $e |- ( ( F ` x ) = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvfo $p |- ( F : A -onto-> B -> ( A. x e. A ph <-> A. y e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
